item.title: RPT-ANALYSIS-China's slow-motion stock rally starts to win investor trust√Ç
item.author: EBR European Business Report
item.description:
(Repeats Monday story with no changes to text)
By Samuel Shen, Jiaxing Li and Rae Wee
SINGAPORE/SHANGHAI, Dec 1 (Reuters) - Fund managers are picking Chinese industrial stocks and holding volatile tech shares, betting a two-year-old equities rally can withstand an economic rough patch, as valuatio...
